info.name: ClickNow ‚Äî Full Backend API (Role-Based)
info.description:
Complete API collection for ClickNow platform.

 FOLDER STRUCTURE (Read This First):
1.  AUTH ‚Äî Login, Register, OTP (no token needed)
2.  CUSTOMER APIs ‚Äî Browsing, Booking, Profile
3.  PROFESSIONAL APIs ‚Äî Onboarding, Dashboard, Earnings
4.  ADMIN APIs ‚Äî Users, Approvals, Reports
5.  SYSTEM ‚Äî Health, Categories, Search, Uploads

 SETUP:
1. Register or Login
2. Copy token from response
3. Set 'token' in Collection Variables
4. All protected routes use: Authorization: Bearer {{token}}

 ROLES:
- client = Customer
- professional = Vendor/Professional
- admin = Admin Panel

AUTH NOTE:
- Register payload uses fullName (no firstName/lastName).
- Email OTP uses SMTP provider.
- Phone OTP supports provider=firebase or provider=mock for testing.

‚úÖ FLOW: Admin Assigns Professional
  1. Customer creates booking (NO professionalId in body)
  2. Status = PENDING
  3. Admin views unassigned bookings queue
  4. Admin calls PUT /admin/bookings/:id/assign { professionalId }
  5. Status = PROCESSING
  6. Professional confirms or rejects

‚ùå FIXED ERRORS:
  - eventType MUST be lowercase: 'wedding' not 'Wedding'
  - specialRequirements: send as plain string (NOT an array)
  - Do NOT send professionalId as empty string (omit it entirely)

Valid eventType values:
wedding | pre_wedding | birthday | anniversary | baby_shower |
naming_ceremony | corporate | product | portrait |
graduation | engagement | concert | event | other

‚úÖ Copy returned booking 'id' ‚Üí set in Collection Variable 'bookingId'

FLOW: Customer picks specific professional from browse screen
  1. Customer includes professionalId in body
  2. Status = PENDING
  3. Professional confirms or rejects directly

‚úÖ Set professionalId in Collection Variables first

status: approved ‚Äî Professional becomes active and searchable
status: rejected ‚Äî Professional notified with reason

Admin Panel: Professional Management ‚Üí Suspend

What happens:
1. Professional profile status ‚Üí 'suspended'
2. isActive ‚Üí false (hidden from search)
3. User role ‚Üí 'client' (DOWNGRADED ‚Äî loses vendor access)
4. They can still login and book services as a customer

‚ö†Ô∏è 'reason' field is REQUIRED

Reversible via: PUT /admin/professionals/:id/reactivate

Admin Panel: Professional Management ‚Üí Reactivate

Reverses a suspension:
1. Professional profile status ‚Üí 'approved'
2. isActive ‚Üí true (visible in search again)
3. User role ‚Üí 'professional' (RESTORED ‚Äî regains vendor access)

No request body needed.
Featured professionals appear in home screen banner
Returns counts: total, pending, approved, rejected, suspended

Admin view of all platform bookings.
Tip: Filter by status=pending and no professionalId to see unassigned bookings queue.

Admin Panel: Booking Management ‚Üí Assign Professional

‚úÖ CORRECT URL: PUT /api/v1/bookings/:id/assign
   (NOT /admin/bookings ‚Äî registered in booking.routes.js)

Used when customer booked WITHOUT choosing a professional.

What happens:
1. Booking professionalId ‚Üí set to chosen professional
2. Status ‚Üí PROCESSING
3. Professional gets push notification: 'New Booking Assigned'
4. Customer gets notification: 'Professional assigned to your booking'
5. Professional then CONFIRMS or REJECTS from their dashboard

‚úÖ Requirements:
- Admin token in Authorization header
- bookingId in URL (set in Collection Variables)
- professionalId in body (must be an APPROVED professional)
